ajito_kakutou_040_system_01: About a year and a half ago...
ajito_kakutou_040_kakutouboss_01: I’m so sorry... I think I went a little too far...[VAR 0114(0022)]
ajito_kakutou_040_akuboss_02:
We’re the ones who asked you to put us through
some tough battle practice so we can train up.[VAR 0114(0021)]
ajito_kakutou_040_dokuboss_01: Truly, you need not apologize, my lady.[VAR 0114(0023)]
ajito_kakutou_040_dokuboss_02:
Thanks to thy sage instruction, I am making
swift strides toward mastering the art of battle![VAR 0114(0023)]
ajito_kakutou_040_fairyboss_01:
And I could never have evolved my Pokémon
without you, Eri![VAR 0114(0020)]
ajito_kakutou_040_honooboss_01:
Even the big boss said it’s thanks to you that we
have a fightin’ chance against our bullies![VAR 0114(001F)]
ajito_kakutou_040_akuboss_03:
See? Nothin’ but gratitude. To us, you’re the
brightest star in the whole team![VAR 0114(0021)]
ajito_kakutou_040_kakutouboss_03: Hehe. Come on, quit being silly![VAR 0114(0022)]
ajito_kakutou_040_fairyboss_02:
Um, just one thing...\c
We’ve been training for four whole hours now.
I’m totally pooped.[VAR 0114(0020)]
ajito_kakutou_040_kakutouboss_04: Ah, I’m sorry! You all really should take a break.[VAR 0114(0022)]
ajito_kakutou_040_kakutouboss_05: I’ll go for a run while you rest up![VAR 0114(0022)]
ajito_kakutou_040_dokuboss_03:
My lady...we four have each trained in our turn—
but you, our steadfast mentor, have rested not\r
once. I cannot help but worry for thy health.[VAR 0114(0023)]
ajito_kakutou_040_kakutouboss_06: Thank you for your concern, Atticus.[VAR 0114(0022)]
ajito_kakutou_040_kakutouboss_07:
But lately...I feel like I can take anything.
No matter if I’m tired or feel like crying.[VAR 0114(0022)]
ajito_kakutou_040_kakutouboss_08:
Remember that time we all got together and
riffed on the Gym Badge designs to create our\r
very own Star Badges?[VAR 0114(0022)]
ajito_kakutou_040_kakutouboss_21:
Well, I don’t know what it is, but just looking at
my Star Badge makes me feel so strong...\c
Like I want to give it my all![VAR 0114(0022)]
ajito_kakutou_040_kakutouboss_09:
I gave my all, but it wasn’t enough—
I wasn’t enough...[VAR 0114(0022)]
ajito_kakutou_040_kakutouboss_10:
You showed amazing strength.\c
Even if the code didn’t require me to give it to
you, I’d want you to have this.[VAR 0114(0022)]
ajito_kakutou_040_waza_01:
I’d like to see you try out my trademark move,
too! Here—this one’s for you.[VAR 0114(0022)]
ajito_kakutou_040_kakutouboss_12: I know you’re part of Operation Starfall...[VAR 0114(0022)]
ajito_kakutou_040_kakutouboss_13:
But I could tell from our battle that you’re not a
bad person.[VAR 0114(0022)]
ajito_kakutou_040_kakutouboss_14:
The way your Pokémon look[VAR NUMBRNCH(00FD,0001)]s at you with such
trust gives it away.[VAR 0114(0022)]
ajito_kakutou_040_kakutouboss_15:
Do me a favor and look away for a moment?
This is a bit much for me to take...[VAR 0114(0022)]
ajito_kakutou_040_nelke_02:
This is the Team Star member you battled at the
gates earlier. I asked her to come along for a talk.[VAR 0114(001E)]
ajito_kakutou_040_sitappa_03: So, what did you want to ask me?[VAR 0114(003F)]
ajito_kakutou_040_nelke_08:
You seem to be on much friendlier terms with Eri
compared to the other grunts.[VAR 0114(001E)]
ajito_kakutou_040_sitappa_04:
Oh, you spotted that?\c
Well, all right... I don’t mind telling you.[VAR 0114(003F)]
ajito_kakutou_040_sitappa_05: Truth is, I used to hate Riri.[VAR 0114(003F)]
ajito_kakutou_040_sitappa_07:
She’s an amazing Trainer and athlete—and she’s
really pretty, too.[VAR 0114(003F)]
ajito_kakutou_040_sitappa_08:
It took her no time at all to become popular at
the academy.[VAR 0114(003F)]
ajito_kakutou_040_sitappa_09:
I was queen of the class before she came along,
but then everyone liked her more than me...[VAR 0114(003F)]
ajito_kakutou_040_nelke_11: So let me guess...you started to pick on her?[VAR 0114(001E)]
ajito_kakutou_040_sitappa_10:
Pretty much. I got our classmates to join in, too...
We were all so stupid.[VAR 0114(003F)]
ajito_kakutou_040_sitappa_12:
But in the end, kids are always fickle—and once
one thrill wears off, they look for something new.[VAR 0114(003F)]
ajito_kakutou_040_sitappa_13:
Before long, the class chose me as their next
target and started bullying me instead.[VAR 0114(003F)]
ajito_kakutou_040_sitappa_14:
I guess I deserved it. But then Riri...she chose to
help me even though I’d been so horrible to her.[VAR 0114(003F)]
ajito_kakutou_040_sitappa_15:
She told me that she understood how hard it is
to have no one on your side...\c
And she invited me into Team Star.[VAR 0114(003F)]
ajito_kakutou_040_nelke_14:
Even after you bullied her like that... What a
kind girl.[VAR 0114(001E)]
ajito_kakutou_040_sitappa_16:
She really is. And joining the team has worked
out great for us. It’s been so much fun![VAR 0114(003F)]
ajito_kakutou_040_nelke_15:
Fun? There are rumors that Team Star likewise
engages in bullying...[VAR 0114(001E)]
ajito_kakutou_040_sitappa_17:
After hearing my story, do you really think
that’s true?[VAR 0114(003F)]
ajito_kakutou_040_sitappa_18:
Riri and the rest of Team Star made me who I
am today.[VAR 0114(003F)]
ajito_kakutou_040_sitappa_19: Please...don’t take away our greatest treasure.[VAR 0114(003F)]
